item.title: Asynchronous initialization in ASP.NET Core with custom middleware
item.description: Update: I no longer recommend the approach described in this post. I propose a better solution here: Asynchronous initialization in ASP.NET Core, revisited. item.title: Understanding the ASP.NET Core middleware pipeline
item.description: Middlewhat? The ASP.NET Core architecture features a system of middleware, which are pieces of code that handle requests and responses. Middleware are chained to each other to form a pipeline. Incoming requests are passed through the pipeline, where each middleware has a chance to do something with them before passing them to the next middleware.
